name: Idir Yacine
biography: Hello! My name is Yacine and I enjoy building things and challenging my limits. Technology has always been a passion of mine since early childhood, and it really spiked to a professional level when I took my first year in computer science.

Fast-forward to today, and I’ve had the privilege of working at a wide range of projects and technologies. I’m passionate about building software that improves the lives of those around me. I love learning new things and I’m always looking for new challenges.
